mapper.insert: insert into car_info (car_id, customer_id, car_no, sort, car_brand_id, car_type_info, is_default, is_virtual, delete_mark, enabled_mark, description, create_date, create_user_Id, create_user_name, modify_date, modify_user_Id, modify_user_name, account, car_vin, give_count, help_count, group_id, account_recharge_total, ab_id, car_brand, years, exhaust_amount, engine_number ) values (#{carId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{customerId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{carNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sort,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{carBrandId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{carTypeInfo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isDefault,jdbcType=BIT}, #{isVirtual,jdbcType=BIT}, #{deleteMark,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{enabledMark,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createUserName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{modifyDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{modifyUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{modifyUserName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{account,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{carVin,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{giveCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{helpCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{groupId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{accountRechargeTotal,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{abId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{carBrand,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{years,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{exhaustAmount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{engineNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.update: update car_info set customer_id = #{customerId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, car_no = #{carNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sort = #{sort,jdbcType=INTEGER}, car_brand_id = #{carBrandId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, car_type_info = #{carTypeInfo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, is_default = #{isDefault,jdbcType=BIT}, is_virtual = #{isVirtual,jdbcType=BIT}, delete_mark = #{deleteMark,jdbcType=INTEGER}, enabled_mark = #{enabledMark,jdbcType=INTEGER}, description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, create_user_Id = #{createUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_user_name = #{createUserName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, modify_date = #{modifyDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, modify_user_Id = #{modifyUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, modify_user_name = #{modifyUserName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, account = #{account,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, car_vin = #{carVin,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, give_count = #{giveCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, help_count = #{helpCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, group_id = #{groupId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, account_recharge_total = #{accountRechargeTotal,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, ab_id = #{abId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, car_brand = #{carBrand,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, years = #{years,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, exhaust_amount = #{exhaustAmount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, engine_number = #{engineNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where car_id = #{carId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select car_id, customer_id, car_no, sort, car_brand_id, car_type_info, is_default, is_virtual, delete_mark, enabled_mark, description, create_date, create_user_Id, create_user_name, modify_date, modify_user_Id, modify_user_name, account, car_vin, give_count, help_count, group_id, account_recharge_total, ab_id, car_brand, years, exhaust_amount, engine_number from car_info where car_id = #{carId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and delete_mark = 0

select car_id, customer_id, car_no, sort, car_brand_id, car_type_info, is_default, is_virtual, delete_mark, enabled_mark, description, create_date, create_user_Id, create_user_name, modify_date, modify_user_Id, modify_user_name, account, car_vin, give_count, help_count, group_id, account_recharge_total, ab_id, car_brand, years, exhaust_amount, engine_number from car_info where delete_mark=0 and is_virtual = 0

select car_id, customer_id, car_no, sort, car_brand_id, car_type_info, is_default, is_virtual, delete_mark, enabled_mark, description, create_date, create_user_Id, create_user_name, modify_date, modify_user_Id, modify_user_name, account, car_vin, give_count, help_count, group_id, account_recharge_total, ab_id, car_brand, years, exhaust_amount, engine_number from car_info where customer_id = #{customerId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and delete_mark=0 and is_virtual = 0
select count(0) from car_info where customer_id = #{customerId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and delete_mark=0 and is_virtual = 0

select car_id, customer_id, car_no, sort, car_brand_id, car_type_info, is_default, is_virtual, delete_mark, enabled_mark, description, create_date, create_user_Id, create_user_name, modify_date, modify_user_Id, modify_user_name, account, car_vin, give_count, help_count, group_id, account_recharge_total, ab_id, car_brand, years, exhaust_amount, engine_number from car_info where customer_id = #{customerId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and delete_mark=0

select car_id, customer_id, car_no, sort, car_brand_id, car_type_info, is_default, is_virtual, delete_mark, enabled_mark, description, create_date, create_user_Id, create_user_name, modify_date, modify_user_Id, modify_user_name, account, car_vin, give_count, help_count, group_id, account_recharge_total, ab_id, car_brand, years, exhaust_amount, engine_number from car_info where customer_id = #{customerId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and delete_mark=0 and is_default = 1

select car_id, customer_id, car_no, sort, car_brand_id, car_type_info, is_default, is_virtual, delete_mark, enabled_mark, description, create_date, create_user_Id, create_user_name, modify_date, modify_user_Id, modify_user_name, account, car_vin, give_count, help_count, group_id, account_recharge_total, ab_id, car_brand, years, exhaust_amount, engine_number from car_info where car_no = #{carNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and delete_mark=0

select car.* , cus.realname as customerName, cus.mobile as mobile
from car_info car LEFT JOIN customer_info cus ON cus.c_id = car.customer_id where car.delete_mark = 0 and (car.group_id is null or car.group_id = '') and car.is_virtual = 0
and car.car_no like concat('%',#{carNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
limit #{startIndex,jdbcType=INTEGER},#{pageSize,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select SUM(account) from car_info where delete_mark = 0 and customer_id = #{customerId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select car.*, cus.realname as customerName, cus.mobile as mobile from car_info car left join customer_info cus on cus.c_id = car.customer_id where car.group_id = #{groupId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and car.delete_mark = 0 and car.is_virtual = 0
select count(0) from car_info where group_id = #{groupId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and delete_mark = 0 and is_virtual = 0

SELECT ci.customer_id AS customerId, ci.car_id AS carId, ci.car_no AS carNo, ci.car_type_info AS carTypeInfo, cg.group_name AS groupName, cb.car_brand_name AS carBrandName, ci.account, ci.is_default AS isDefault, ci.car_vin AS carVin, ab.benefit_name AS benefitName, ci.car_brand AS carBrand, ci.years, ci.exhaust_amount AS exhaustAmount, ci.engine_number AS engineNumber, ci.create_date AS createDate FROM car_info ci LEFT JOIN car_group cg ON ci.group_id = cg.group_id LEFT JOIN car_brand cb ON ci.car_brand_id = cb.car_brand_id LEFT JOIN account_benefit ab ON ci.ab_id = ab.ab_id WHERE ci.customer_id = #{customerId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and ci.delete_mark = 0 and ci.is_virtual = 0 ORDER BY ci.create_date DESC

SELECT ci.customer_id AS customerId, ci.car_id AS carId, ci.car_brand AS carBrand, cg.group_id AS groupId, cb.car_brand_id AS carBrandId, ab.ab_id AS abId, ci.car_no AS carNo, cg.group_name AS groupName, cb.car_brand_name AS carBrandName, ci.car_type_info AS carTypeInfo, ci.sort, ci.account, ci.is_default AS isDefault, ci.is_virtual AS isVirtual, ci.car_vin AS carVin, ab.benefit_name AS benefitName, ab.level, ci.give_count AS giveCount, ci.help_count AS helpCount, ci.car_brand AS carBrand, ci.years, ci.exhaust_amount AS exhaustAmount, ci.engine_number AS engineNumber, ci.create_date AS createDate FROM car_info ci LEFT JOIN car_group cg ON ci.group_id = cg.group_id LEFT JOIN car_brand cb ON ci.car_brand_id = cb.car_brand_id LEFT JOIN account_benefit ab ON ci.ab_id = ab.ab_id WHERE ci.car_id = #{carId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

SELECT ci.customer_id AS customerId, ci.car_id AS carId, ci.car_brand AS carBrand, cg.group_id AS groupId, cb.car_brand_id AS carBrandId, ab.ab_id AS abId, ci.car_no AS carNo, cg.group_name AS groupName, cb.car_brand_name AS carBrandName, ci.car_type_info AS carTypeInfo, ci.sort, ci.account, ci.is_default AS isDefault, ci.is_virtual AS isVirtual, ci.car_vin AS carVin, ab.benefit_name AS benefitName, ab.level, ci.give_count AS giveCount, ci.help_count AS helpCount, ci.car_brand AS carBrand, ci.years, ci.exhaust_amount AS exhaustAmount, ci.engine_number AS engineNumber, ci.create_date AS createDate FROM car_info ci LEFT JOIN car_group cg ON ci.group_id = cg.group_id LEFT JOIN car_brand cb ON ci.car_brand_id = cb.car_brand_id LEFT JOIN account_benefit ab ON ci.ab_id = ab.ab_id WHERE ci.car_no = #{carNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
